content: 1 blank canvas wardrobe essentials multi-size basic doll top constructed top down flat and seamless let your creativity flow this pattern is perfect as a jumping point for lace collars sleeves stripes or wherever your imagination takes you includes 6 different sizes to clothe my entire doll collection suitable for beginners pattern is not instructional and assumes basic knitting knowledge and how to find help **note o1o= yo p1 yo sgs033 sugar grove south blank canvas 2 version 1 fits dolls such as australian girl or american girl dk size 4 needles 5 buttons samples made with
